name: Trials De Las Nalgas
description:
Trials de las Nalgas is a third-person story focused puzzle platformer developed, in Unity, by Team Spectacle. The game uses ominous tones to shroud an immature and ridiculous objective that is only expressed in languages other than English. This is a student project from 2018 and the first game the members of this team had worked on.

Hope you enjoy it and all its flaws. :)
